desc: Teaching your students has never been easier than with ADOBE DREAMWEAVER CS5 ILLUSTRATED. This reader-friendly book presents each skill on two facing pages, providing detailed instructions on the left-hand page and large, full-color screenshots on the right page. The visual format helps students intuitively grasp the concepts in the book and apply them to the classroom and workplace environment.
title: Adobe Dreamweaver CS5 Illustrated (Illustrated Series: Adobe Creative Suite)
